methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new Highlight that indicates where to highlight text in the listing fields.

params.name: start
params.comment: the starting character position to highlight

params.name: end
params.comment: the ending character position (inclusive) to highlight

params.name: color
params.comment: the color to use for highlighting.

methods.javadoc: Returns the starting position of the highlight.
methods.name: getStart
methods.comment: Returns the starting position of the highlight.

methods.javadoc: Returns the ending position (inclusive) of the highlight.
methods.name: getEnd
methods.comment: Returns the ending position (inclusive) of the highlight.

methods.javadoc: Returns the color to use as the background highlight color.
methods.name: getColor
methods.comment: Returns the color to use as the background highlight color.

methods.javadoc:
Sets the offset of this highlights start and end values.  The effect of the offset is that
 calls to {@link #getStart()} and {@link #getEnd()} will return their values with the 
 offset added.
@param newOffset The new offset into this highlight.
methods.name: setOffset
methods.comment:
Sets the offset of this highlights start and end values.  The effect of the offset is that
 calls to #getStart() and #getEnd() will return their values with the 
 offset added.

params.name: newOffset
params.comment: The new offset into this highlight.
